column1: As per the above admission, it’s established that the Petitioner is in possession of the land
depicted in the quit notice. The Petitioner’s position is that she is in  possession of the land
as she has obtained the title to the said land. To establish her title, she relies on documents
marked as X2 and X3. This Court observes that she has requested the then Chief Minister
on  sympathetic  grounds  to  release  the  corpus  depicted  in  the  quit  notice  by  her  letter
marked as X1. The Document marked as X2 is in response to the said request.
